description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Enterprise Manager RESTful API.  (Grafana 8.x / InfluxDB v2.x)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamBackupServers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${enterprisemanager:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamRepositoryServers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${enterprisemanager:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamProxyServers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${enterprisemanager:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview_vms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamProtectedVms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${enterprisemanager:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview_vms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamReplicatedVms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${enterprisemanager:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamSuccessfulVmLastestStates")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${enterprisemanager:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamWarningVmLastestStates")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${enterprisemanager:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamFailedVmLastestStates")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${enterprisemanager:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview_repositories")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamRepositoryCapacity" or r["_field"] == "veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamRepositoryName"] =~ /${repository:regex}/) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value: float(v: r.veeamRepositoryFreeSpace) / float(v: r.veeamRepositoryCapacity) * 100.0 }))
  |> group(columns: ["veeamRepositoryName","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview_repositories")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamRepositoryCapacity" or r["_field"] == "veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamRepositoryName"] =~ /${repository:regex}/) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value: float(v: r.veeamRepositoryFreeSpace) / float(v: r.veeamRepositoryCapacity) * 100.0 }))
  |> group(columns: ["veeamRepositoryName","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "win_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Percent_Privileged_Time" or r["_field"] == "Percent_User_Time" or r["_field"] == "Percent_Interrupt_Time")
  |> group(columns: ["veeamserver","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "win_mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Available_Bytes" or r["_field"] == "Pool_Nonpaged_Bytes" or r["_field"] == "Pool_Paged_Bytes")
  |> group(columns: ["veeamserver","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "win_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "System_Up_Time")
  |> group(columns: ["veeamserver","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "win_disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Percent_Free_Space")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] != "HarddiskVolume1")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value: 100.0 - float(v: r.Percent_Free_Space)  }))
  |> group(columns: ["_field","instance"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "win_net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Bytes_Received_persec" or r["_field"] == "Bytes_Sent_persec")
  |> group(columns: ["instance","veeamserver","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_job_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamBackupSessionsJobResult")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamBackupSessionsName"] =~ /${backupjob:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamBackupSessionsJobType"] =~ /${backuptype:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_job_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamReplicaSessionsJobResult")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamReplicaSessionsName"] =~ /${replicajob:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_job_sessionsvm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamBackupSessionsJobVMResult")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamBackupSessionsVmDisplayName"] =~ /${backupvm:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
 |> group(columns: ["veeamBackupSessionsVmDisplayName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_job_sessionsvm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamReplicaSessionsJobVMResult")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamReplicaSessionsVmDisplayName"] =~ /${replicavm:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_agents")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamAgentStatus" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamAgentName"] =~ /${veeamagent:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamAgentName","veeamAgentOsVersion","veeamAgentVersion"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_nas_jobs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamNASJobShortTerm" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamNASJobPath"] =~ /${veeamnas:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamNASJobName","veeamAgeveeamNASJobPathntOsVersion","veeamNASJobShortTermType","veeamNASJobExclusions"])
  |> last()

SELECT last("veeamNASJobShortTerm") AS "Short-Term" FROM "veeam_em_nas_jobs" WHERE ("veeamNASJobPath" =~ /^$veeamnas$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "veeamNASJobShortTermType", "veeamNASJobExclusions" fill(none)

panels.title: Veeam NAS Jobs Status and Information

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_nas_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamNASJobDuration" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamNASJobName"] =~ /${veeamnasjob:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamNASJobName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: $veeamserver v$veeamversionM ($veeamversion) - Job Historical Performance and Duration

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_job_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamBackupSessionsJobResult" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamBackupSessionsName"] =~ /${backupjob:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamBackupSessionsJobType"] =~ /${backuptype:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamBackupSessionsName"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_job_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamBackupSessionsTimeDuration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamBackupSessionsName"] =~ /${backupjob:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamBackupSessionsJobType"] =~ /${backuptype:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamBackupSessionsName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_job_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "veeamReplicaSessionsDuration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamReplicaSessionsName"] =~ /${replicajob:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] =~ /${veeamserver:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamReplicaSessionsName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_overview")
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
  |> group()
list.label: Enterprise Manager
list.name: enterprisemanager

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_em_nas_jobs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamNASJobPath"] != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamVBR"] == "${veeamserver}")
  |> keep(columns: ["veeamNASJobPath"])
  |> distinct(column: "veeamNASJobPath")
  |> group()
